query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: End-of-Project KGSIR on interaction of ocean heat uptake and radiative feedback change via SST-pattern change
result.description: D3.2 (M42, MET OFFICE, STOCKHOLM, MPG): End-of-Project KGSIR on interaction of ocean heat uptake and radiative feedback change via SST-pattern change. Quantifying the likelihood of future periods, which are similar to the last 30 years (strong ocean heat uptake combined with negative feedback parameter) (Tasks 3.1.2, 3.1.3).
